title: rowan-n.github.io
text:
This is a website I created for my Data Science class. It contains a page about me, as well as a dropdown of a few tidyverse data sets I’ve analysed.
This website will be expanded on over the course of the semester!
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About
text:
Rowan Norenberg is a linguistics, data science, and French student. When they’re not in class or studying, they perform in choir and run D&D campaigns for their friends.


Pomona College | Claremont, CA B.A. in Linguistics | Sept 2023 - June 2027

title: Tidy Tuesday - D&D Monsters
text:
This is a plot I made comparing the different types of D&D monsters with their total hit points and their strength score / modifier.









Tidyverse Link: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data/2024/2024-12-17
Dataset Citation: Harmon J (2025). dddata: Data from the Dungeons and Dragons System Reference Document. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/jonthegeek/dddata.

title: Tidy Tuesday - D&D Spells
text:
This is a plot I made trying to see which of the schools of magic had the longest spell range on average. This was made complicated by the spell range being stored as character strings (eg “30 feet” or “Touch”) so I made levels. Unfortunatley this doesn’t give a great representation at how different 300 feet is from 500 feet versus 5 feet from 10 feet. Work in progress.









Tidyverse link: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data/2024/2024-12-17
Dataset Citation: Harmon J (2025). dddata: Data from the Dungeons and Dragons System Reference Document. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/jonthegeek/dddata.
